name: match-preview
description: 試合前ガイド（プレビュー）静的Webサイト

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run build:fix-html
scripts.build:fix-html: cp dist/src/index.html dist/index.html 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/data dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:demo: npm run build && npm run optimize-demo
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.serve:static: npm run build && npx serve dist -l 5000
scripts.demo: npm run build:demo && pm2 start 'npx serve dist -l 8080' --name demo-server
scripts.demo:stop: pm2 delete demo-server 2>/dev/null || echo 'Demo server not running'
